title: The Monarch Butterfly
description: The Monarch Butterfly is a well-known North American butterfly famous for its distinctive orange and black wings and its incredible long-distance migration patterns.

questions.question: How far can Monarch Butterflies migrate during their annual journey?
How many generations of Monarch Butterflies are there in a single year?
What is the primary food source for adult Monarch Butterflies?
Which plant do Monarch Butterfly caterpillars exclusively feed on?
How long do adult Monarch Butterflies typically live?
